channel.title: ChannelAdam WCF Library on DevZone.ChannelAdam.com
channel.description: Recent contentin ChannelAdam WCF Library on DevZone.ChannelAdam.com

item.title: Version 1 Documentation | ChannelAdam WCF Library
item.description: Version 1 documentation for a .NET code library that handles the subtleties of consuming services using Microsoft's Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) library - including correctly performing the Close/Abort pattern and preventing memory and server connection leaks.

item.title: Version 2 Documentation | ChannelAdam WCF Library
item.description: Version 2 documentation for a .NET code library that handles the subtleties of consuming services using Microsoft's Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) library - including correctly performing the Close/Abort pattern and preventing memory and server connection leaks.
